content:
This PR #13202 adds lemmas about docs#fixing_subgroup and docs#fixing_submonoid.

  • The definitions are pulled back in a new file group_theory.group_action.fixing_subgroup from field_theory.galois.

  • Some lemmas are added (fixing subgroup of a union, etc.)

  • The Galois connection relating it with fixed_points is proved

  • Meanwhile, I needed some iff-lemmas related to antitone, similar to docs#antitone.dual etc. but that could be rewritten in both directions.
The antitone lemmas have been rewritten and transferred to #13207

One lemma competes with docs#mem_fixing_subgroup_iff from the file on Krull topology, where it cannot simply be removed because the types don't match. Just adding a namespace there could be enough, but my impression is that one can adjust a few things there to profit of the present file.
That lemma should be renamed, it's about docs#intermediate_field.fixing_subgroup so should be called intermediate_field.mem_fixing_subgroup_iff
Of course, you could argue that that definition is vestigial after #11938; I just didn't have the motivation to try and clean it up
I'll do the renaming as you say.
